If interested, you can use our press kit with logos, some example posts, and corresponding visuals - all ready to go, just plug & play! Simply follow the link below:
{{press_kit_url}}
Would you be willing to share information about the event with your network? Even a single social media post or email forward would be tremendously helpful.

Here are a few ways you can help spread the word:
- Share our event on LinkedIn, Twitter, or your preferred social platform
- Forward this email to relevant contacts
- Mention the event in your newsletter or community updates

Every share helps us reach more people in the biotech community!
